column4: how do i know if ipw2200 module/driver is installed on my jaunty machine?
its not there...so i thought maybe it was not installed properly?
when i do 'lscpi | grep ipw ' i get nothing...but when i do 'locate ipw' i see it in serverala locations...but i dunno if it is a complete installation
does that make sense to u?
locate don't show driver installed, i think
k...so how would i reinstall ipw2200....?
give me one minute to check
guys how do u find out what linux kernel u are currently using in the terminal?
ipw2200 driver already provided on Ubuntu, you try again with lspci | grep Wireless
i just reinstalled my kernel...i'm gonna reboot and see if that helps
i read in a forum that this might help fix issues with ipw2200 and get ure wireless working
I don't have any idea, but It gives you a try. reboot don't take you more time :)
